channel.title: Need urgent help
channel.description: Hey I host my server and my friend connects fine, but when he hosts it himself his client does not allow him to play. It says error connecting to server when he clicks login. Can you guys help me? Whenver I host it myself again he connects fine.

item.title: Need urgent help
item.dc:creator: @No_Life2 No Life
item.description:
@No_Life2 wrote:

When you host it…he can connect…because the client’s IP is set to YOUR computer’s IP.

When he hosts it…he can’t…maybe because he didn’t change the client’s IP to 127.0.0.1?

Read full topic

item.title: Need urgent help
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

There’s a difference between you being able to connect to a server on computer that being able to connect to one on a different tutorial. He needs to port forward, sometimes uTorrent does not do it properly.

Read full topic

item.title: Need urgent help
item.dc:creator: @Owner_Chaos Owner Chaos
item.description:
@Owner_Chaos wrote:

I never portfowarded and I host fine, were both using uTorrent

Read full topic

item.title: Need urgent help
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Your friends needs to port forward, have him follow one of the tutorials in the tutorial section.

Read full topic
